flawed_nl_solution:
Pedro has 100 squares - 60 squares = <<100-60=40>>40 more squares than Jesus.
Pedro has 100 squares - 75 squares = <<100-75=28>>28 more squares than Linden.
Combined Pedro has 40 squares + 28 squares = <<40+28=68>>68 squares more than both Jesus and Linden.
#### 68

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 28. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
